General_Description: '''The Illusion of Peace''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "The filthy [[Athens|Athenians]] won't walk [[Sparta|our]] streets for too long. Exterminate them to show who truly rules."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew Athenian [[soldier]]s and sank Athenian [[ship]]s throughout [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
